A few days ago I started a new blog, and then suddenly Delphiforums now
has blogs available, so I've moved everything over there, since I have
more control over that blog. So for anyone interested in following the
goings-ons of the Samurai Archives, here is the site, which allows
comments, and has an RSS feed like the old site:

(yahoo might break the link up, you might have to cut and paste each
section seperately)
http://blogs.delphiforums.com/n/blogs/blog.aspx?webtag=japanesehistory
<http://blogs.delphiforums.com/n/blogs/blog.aspx?webtag=japanesehistory>


Here is the RSS feed (which will probably get broken up by Yahoo, but
you can visit the blog and get it there if you want it):

http://acx.prospero.com/dir-app/acx/ActiveContent.aspx?type=blog&fmt=rss\
&webtag=japanesehistory
